description.value: Once per day, an astriapi can spend 10 minutes to produce a vial of magical honey. This honey functions as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.wKVMw34GyIVXXs0w]{Serum of Healing, Mk 1}. At 5th level (or CR 5), the honey functions as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.4HzMPv5UPcZYEdL1]{Serum of Healing, Mk 2}, and at 9th level (or CR 9),  it functions as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.9Tgfgec4VaGkNHLR]{Serum of Healing, Mk 3}. Regardless of its level, the honey canâ€™t be sold, and its magical properties expire after 24 hours, when it turns into mundane foodstuff.

modifiers.name: Skilled - diplo
modifiers.notes: Naturally eloquent and perceptive, aasimars gain +2 racial bonus to Diplomacy and Perception checks.

modifiers.name: Skilled - percep
modifiers.notes: Naturally eloquent and perceptive, aasimars gain +2 racial bonus to Diplomacy and Perception checks.
